name: Battlebone
description:
You are stuck in a dank chamber. Survive as long as you can against the skeleton hordes.

KEYS: U/D arrow - move forward and backward L/R arrow - rotate left and right Z or X - stab

TIPS: Use your map in the top left corner to get your bearings. Picking up the giant gold doubloons to increase your health and get a point boost. Skeletons take 3 stabs to kill.
